summary: Activities that are paused should have their heartbeating interrupted to prevent unnecessary heartbeat signals while activities are suspended.
userImpact: Users experience unnecessary heartbeat signals being sent for paused activities, wasting resources and potentially causing confusion in activity monitoring.
rootCause: The heartbeating mechanism does not check or respect the pause state of activities before sending heartbeats.
resolutionDetails: Heartbeating activities are now properly interrupted when activities are paused.
keyQuote: Heartbeating activities should be interrupted when the activities are paused.
